mods.abstract: DETAINED in the jail of the parish of St. John the Baptist the negro boy DOCTOR, aged about 30 years, measuring 5 feet 8 inches high, having a scar in the forehead; belonging to the Judge Rost parish of St. Charles. The owner is hereby duly notified to claim his property according to law. Parish of St John the Baptist, September 17th 1858. U. JACOB, Sheriff.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
